alert.note: Alert for Washington (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 28 at 9:10PM EST until January 31 at 8:30AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Large stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Ohio, including the following county, Washington. * WHEN...Until 500 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of Duck Creek and it`s tributaries and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 909 PM EST, gauge reports indicated that Duck Creek continues to flood. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Macksburg and Lower Salem. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
